name: Overlaid
description:
『Overlaid』 is a very simple game.
All you have to do is to touch the screen when the circles overlap,
And enjoy 『Overlaid』 with soft music.

There are many themes like ocean, magma, space, flower, shooting star, rain etc., in the game.
Let's play and unlock them!


【Features】
◎Easy to control.
◎Many unique themes.
◎Various background music and sound effects.
◎Screenshots shareing.
◎Stylish gameplay.
